mapper.select: SELECT CLINO, CLINAME, CALLNAME, CLIADDR1,CLIADDR2,CLIADDR3,BSTYPE,MEMO ,IMPORTANCE, FRIENDLY ,A.OWNER, B.USERNAME ,IFNULL( CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(A.CORP_SN) = 12 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CORP_SN,1,6),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CORP_SN,7,6)) ELSE '' END,'') AS CORP_SN ,IFNULL( CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(A.BSNO) = 10 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.BSNO,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.BSNO,4,2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.BSNO,6,5)) ELSE '' END,'') AS BSNO ,A.PRSDNAME ,A.CLIADDR1, A.CLIADDR2, CLIADDR3 ,A.TELNO1, A.TELNO2, A.TELNO3 ,A.FAXTEL1, A.FAXTEL2, A.FAXTEL3 ,A.MOBILE1, A.MOBILE2, A.MOBILE3 ,A.BSCOND, A.BSTYPE, A.BSCATEGORY ,A.COMPANYSIZE,A.INTERNAL,A.MEMO,A.EMAIL FROM sa200010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 B ON A.OWNER = B.USERNO WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.CLINO = #{clino}

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM sa280010 A INNER JOIN CU100010 B ON A.CUSTNO = B.CUSTNO
WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.CLINO = #{clino}
AND B.CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{custname} ,'%')

SELECT ROWNUM,CLICUSTNO ,KEYMAN, ROLENAME, MEMO ,CUSTNO, CUSTNAME, DEPTNAME, DUTY, EMAIL ,CLINO, CLINAME
FROM ( SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM ,A.CLICUSTNO ,A.KEYMAN, A.ROLENAME, A.MEMO ,B.CUSTNO, B.CUSTNAME, B.DEPTNAME, B.DUTY, B.EMAIL ,C.CLINO, C.CLINAME FROM sa280010 A INNER JOIN CU100010 B ON A.CUSTNO = B.CUSTNO INNER JOIN sa200010 C ON A.CLINO = C.CLINO ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) R
WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CLINO = #{clino} AND A.ISDELETE = 0
AND B.CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{custname} ,'%')
ORDER BY B.CUSTNAME )t
WHERE ROWNUM between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
